column3: meyɛ Kraest Jesus daduanyi ma hom amanamamfo
column5: "ɔbɛyɛ dɛ hom atse ofihwɛ edwuma a hom ntsi wɔdze ama me no ho asɛm
column7: "mbrɛ wɔnam nyikyerɛ do yii esumasɛm no kyerɛɛ me
column8: dɛ mbrɛ makyerɛw no nsɛm tsiabaa bi mu abrɛ hom no."

column4: hom dze bohu me ntseasee a ɔwɔ Kraest esumasɛm no mu a"

column2: "mbersantsen bi mu wɔamma nyimpa mba ennhu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ afei woeyi akyerɛ n'asomafo nye nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn wɔ Sunsum mu no."

column2: "Ɔno nye dɛ amanamamfo so bɛyɛ adzedzifo bi
column3: nye nyimpadua kor no ara bi
column4: na wɔnam asɛmpa no do eenya kyɛfa wɔ anohoba no ho bi

column3: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn adom akyɛdze a wɔdze akyɛ hɛn no tum edwumayɛ tse no."

column2: "Emi a musuar sen ahotseweefo nyina no na wɔdze adom yi adom me
column3: dɛ menka Kraest ahonya a onnyi nhwehwɛmu no ho asɛm nkyerɛ amanamamfo;"

column2: "na memma nyimpa nyina nhu esumasɛm no ho dwumadzi a ofi tsetseetse nyina oesuma wɔ Nyankopɔn a ɔbɔɔ ndzɛmba nyina no mu no."
"Ama afei ɔnam asɔr no do ama mpanyindzi nye etum horow a wɔwɔ sor hɔ eehu Nyankopɔn nyansaa horow pii no
column4: "dɛ mbrɛ tsetse tsirmpɔw a ɔbɔe wɔ hɛn Ewuradze Kraest Jesus mu no tse."

column2: "No mu na yɛnam no ho gyedzi do enya ndamyɛ nye kwan wɔ awerɛhyɛmu mu."
"Dɛm ntsi meserɛ dɛ mma hom abaw mu mmbu wɔ amandze a hom ntsi muruhu no ho
"Iyi ntsi na mubu ntwɛr wɔ Egya no enyim
column4: "ɔno a wofi no mu na egyamba a wɔwɔ sor nye asaase nyina no nya hɔn dzin."

column3: ɔmma hom ndua no Sunsum do nnya tum mu ahoɔdzen wɔ hom mu nyimpasu no mu."

column2: "Ɔmma Kraest ndua gyedzi do ntsena hom akoma mu; ama sɛ hom gye ndwow na hom tsintsim wɔ dɔ mu a
column4: "hom eenya ahoɔdzen nye ahotseweefo no nyina eehu Kraest no dɔ no ne tɛtɛr
column6: no krɔn no nye no bun no."

column3: nkyɛ hom eehu Kraest no dɔ a ɔbor ntseasee nyina do no
column4: na Nyankopɔn amayɛ nyina aahyɛ hom ma."

column3: onyia no a otum dɛ ɔyɛ ma ɔtra mbordo kyɛn adze nyina a yebisa anaa yɛdwen
column4: dɛ mbrɛ tum a ɔyɛ hɛn mu edwuma no tse
column6: "ɔno na enyimnyam nka no asɔr no mu
column8: nkɔ mbersantsen mfesantsen nyina mu. Amen."
